name: Last Fortress (itch)
description:
Last Fortress is a game inspired by Plant vs Zombie.

Players are required to protect the generator on the left side of the screen from the wave of enemies that spawn on the opposite side. 

Controls :

WASD -> Camera Movement

Right Click (Hold) -> Camera Rotate

R -> Change Mode (Build Mode / Shoot Mode)

Left Click (Build Mode) -> Select a Tile / Build a Tower

Left Click (Shoot Mode) -> Shoots at a Tile / an Enemy

Players start with 5 coins at the beginning of the game. Players gain one extra coin for each enemy defeated. If needed, Players can assist their towers in defending the generator by pressing R to enter 'Shoot Mode' and shoot at the enemies.
